trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with ThousandEyes | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with ThousandEyes | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use ThousandEyes with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use ThousandEyes with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show how to set up single sign-on between Azure Active Directory (AAD) and ThousandEyes.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show how to set up single sign-on between Azure Active Directory (AAD) and ThousandEyes.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A ThousandEyes single sign on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A ThousandEyes single sign on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the AAD users to whom you have assign ThousandEyes access will be able to single sign into the application at your ThousandEyes company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the AAD Access Panel .
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the AAD users to whom you have assign ThousandEyes access will be able to single sign into the application at your ThousandEyes company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the AAD Access Panel .

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for ThousandEyes
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for ThousandEyes

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configuring Single Sign-On</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configuring Single Sign-On</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for ThousandEyes.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for ThousandEyes.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type ThousandEyes.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type ThousandEyes.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select ThousandEyes, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select ThousandEyes, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>ThousandEyes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>ThousandEyes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: This section outlines how to enable users to authenticate to ThousandEyes with their account in Azure Active Directory, using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: This section outlines how to enable users to authenticate to ThousandEyes with their account in Azure Active Directory, using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the ThousandEyes application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the ThousandEyes application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to ThousandEyes page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to ThousandEyes page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the ThousandEyes Sign On URL textbox, type the URL users are using to sign into your ThousandEyes application (e.g.: "https://app.thousandeyes.com/login/sso"), and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the ThousandEyes Sign On URL textbox, type the URL users are using to sign into your ThousandEyes application (e.g.: "https://app.thousandeyes.com/login/sso"), and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally to your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally to your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, sign on to your ThousandEyes company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, sign on to your ThousandEyes company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click Settings.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click Settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Account
trans-unit.target: Click Account

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Account</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Account</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the Security & Authentication tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the Security & Authentication tab.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Security & Authentication</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Security & Authentication</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Setup Single Sign-On section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Setup Single Sign-On section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Enable Single Sign-On.
trans-unit.target: Select Enable Single Sign-On.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Login Page URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Login Page URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Remote Logout URL value, and then paste it into the Logout Page URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Remote Logout URL value, and then paste it into the Logout Page URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Issuer URL value, and then paste it into the Identity Provider Issuer textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at ThousandEyes page, copy the Issuer URL value, and then paste it into the Identity Provider Issuer textbox.

trans-unit.source: In Identity Provider Certificate, click Choose file, and then upload the certificate you have downloaded from the Microsoft Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: In Identity Provider Certificate, click Choose file, and then upload the certificate you have downloaded from the Microsoft Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click Save.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single SignOn</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into ThousandEyes, they must be provisioned into ThousandEyes.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into ThousandEyes, they must be provisioned into ThousandEyes.

trans-unit.source: In the case of ThousandEyes, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of ThousandEyes, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log into your ThousandEyes company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log into your ThousandEyes company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Click Settings.
trans-unit.target: Click Settings.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Account.
trans-unit.target: Click Account.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Account</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Account</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click the Accounts & Users tab.
trans-unit.target: Click the Accounts & Users tab.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Accounts & Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Accounts & Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Add Users & Accounts section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Add Users & Accounts section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add User Accounts</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add User Accounts</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Type the Name, Email and other details of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the Name, Email and other details of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click Add New User to Account.
trans-unit.target: Click Add New User to Account.

trans-unit.source: The AAD account holder will get an email including a link to confirm and activate the account.
trans-unit.target: The AAD account holder will get an email including a link to confirm and activate the account.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other ThousandEyes user account creation tools or APIs provided by ThousandEyes to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other ThousandEyes user account creation tools or APIs provided by ThousandEyes to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the ThousandEyes application integration page, click Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the ThousandEyes application integration page, click Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
